# Equipments Insert Details

This endpoint allows you to insert details about equipment and service requests.

## Request Body

- **firstName** (text, required): The first name of the requester.
    
- **lastName** (text, required): The last name of the requester.
    
- **departmentName** (text, required): The name of the department.
    
- **email** (text, required): The email of the requester.
    
- **natureOfService** (text, required): The nature of the service request.
    
- **purpose** (text, required): The purpose of the request.
    
- **venue** (text, required): The venue where the service will be provided.
    
- **equipmentCategories** (array, required): An array of equipment categories with the following sub-parameters:
    
    - **category** (text, required): The category of equipment.
        
    - **quantity** (text, required): The quantity of equipment.
        
    - **dateRequested** (text, required): The date of the request.
        
    - **timeRequested** (text, required): The time of the request.
        

## Response

- **successful** (boolean): Indicates if the request was successful.
    
- **message** (text): A message related to the request.
    
- **sessionID** (text): The session ID.
    

## Adding Cookies

To add cookies to the request in the browser console, you can use the appropriate JavaScript code to set the cookies before making the POST request.
